MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH8 and LL19 postcode area of Holywell and Prestatyn, affecting properties in Station Road, West Road, Didsbury Avenue and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:55PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a broken overhead line pole. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 01:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:25PM on 28th March 2021.
